name: intimidate

effect.scarlet_violet: Does not take effect if acquired after entering battle.
effect.the_teal_mask: Does not take effect if acquired after entering battle.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Does not take effect if acquired after entering battle.

short_effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it intimidates opposing Pokémon and makes them cower, lowering their Attack stats.
